shri lankawehiyuddha hamudapathi lesin, shri lankika siwil yuddhaya 2009 di kelawara kirimata sadhaniya bhumikawak itu kaleya. 2008 di welupille prabhakaranta min mathuwata mahawira katha pawathwimata ida nothabanabawa prakasha kala athara thama hamudapathi lesa path wu pasu koti thrasthawadiprashnaya thawath hamudapathiwarayakuta ithiri nokarana bawa pawasu mohu ee anuwa yaminma koti thrasthawadaya sampurnayen winasha kaleya.
